patterns: I'm here to see Maria Gonzalez.
I'm here for Mr. Robert Jones.
I need a badge for Sarah Patel.
Here to see grandmother, Helen Clark.
I'm here for Tim Baker in room 402.
I need to see Jessica Turner.
I'd like to see Kevin Nguyen.
responses: Thank you. One moment while I locate {patient_name}'s room and finish your badge.
Got it—preparing your visitor badge for {patient_name} now.
Certainly. I'll print your badge for {patient_name}.
{patient_name}—understood. Please hold while I generate your visitor pass.
Thank you for the patient name. Your badge for {patient_name} will be ready shortly.
Badge request for {patient_name} noted—please wait just a moment.

patterns: Yes, I'll pick it up at the desk.
Great, I'll grab the badge now.
Sure, heading over to pick up.
Yes, I'll pick it up shortly.
Understood, I'll get the visitor pass.
I'll stop by and grab the badge.
Yep, I'll pick it up at the front.
I'll pick it up at security.
I'll get it from the counter.
responses: Perfect. Your visitor badge is ready at the front desk.
Great—please present your photo ID at the reception to collect the badge.
Your badge is waiting at Security. Let them know your name upon arrival.
Understood. The badge will be at the visitor kiosk for pickup.
All set. You can collect your badge any time today during visiting hours.
Thank you. We’ll hold the badge at the desk for you.

patterns: Need a special diet for my meal.
Can I request a vegetarian menu?
I'd like to discuss my diet needs.
Can you arrange vegan meals for me?
I have a nut allergy—need safe meals.
Can you add me to the kosher menu?
I want to set up meal accommodations.
Please note my special diet request.
Can someone help with my meal plan?
I’m on a soft foods diet.
I'd like my meals without pork.
Can I get meals fitting my cultural diet?
responses: Certainly. Could you tell me the specifics of your dietary needs?
Of course—please describe your restriction so we can assist.
Happy to help. What type of diet do you require?
Absolutely. Let me know your dietary preference or allergy details.
Sure thing. Please provide the exact dietary restrictions you follow.
Certainly. What should we note for your meals?

patterns: I need vegetarian meals, no meat or fish.
responses: Thank you. I've noted your request for a {diet} diet and will inform Food Services.
Understood—your meals will follow the {diet} guidelines.
Got it. We’ll update your meal plan to {diet}.
Your {diet} preference has been recorded with the kitchen.
Certainly. I’ve forwarded your {diet} request to our dietary team.
The {diet} diet is now on file—let us know if anything changes.
Your dietary accommodation is confirmed. Meals will be adjusted accordingly.
Great—your meal plan has been updated. Let staff know if you need anything else.
All set! Food Services have your requirements on file.
Thank you for confirming. We’ll ensure your meals meet the requested guidelines.
Your request is finalized. Feel free to alert us if preferences change.
Confirmed. Enjoy your upcoming meals, and let us know of any concerns.
